title: Primitive - Security Reissuance Transaction
description: Abstract object describing common properties to a reissuance of a security

resulting_security_ids.title: Security Reissuance - Resulting Security ID Array
resulting_security_ids.description: Identifier of the new security (or securities) issuance resulting from a reissuance

split_transaction_id.title: Id of stock class split transaction
split_transaction_id.description: When stock is reissued as a result of a stock split, this field contains id of the respective stock class split transaction. It is not set otherwise.

reason_text.title: Reason for stock reissuance
reason_text.description: Free-form human-readable reason for stock reissuance
